import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import { ArrowRightCircle } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import headerImg from '../assets/img/header-img.svg'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export const Banner = () => { const texts = ["Software Developer", Website] return (
Welcome to my Portfolio

{`Hello I'm Nick. `}Software Developer

I am a Developer open to working on all kinds on projects
) }
